channel.title: Boss teleport REP + [delta]
channel.description: Hello, the server i have doesnt have a boss teleport so I am adding one, I am adding a corp beast, the npc is already fully added besides me having to add it the ability to attack and drop(easy) I have it already that the camelot teleport says bosses, but how do I make it so that when you click bosses, a chat window appears with the choice of teleports? and how do I make it so when you click on it teleports you.

item.title: Boss teleport REP + [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

DubbinStep:

Hello, the server i have doesnt have a boss teleport so I am adding one, I am adding a corp beast, the npc is already fully added besides me having to add it the ability to attack and drop(easy) I have it already that the camelot teleport says bosses, but how do I make it so that when you click bosses, a chat window appears with the choice of teleports? and how do I make it so when you click on it teleports you.

Find the case Id for that camelot teleport. Have it print out in the console:

System.out.println("");

Once you’ve found that, go to that case. I’m not sure how delta handles npc dialogues, but you’re going to have to insert a dialogue there with an option into that case. If they click yes then teleport them to those coordinates. If they click no then close all windows. I’m not sure about what methods to use though because you’re using delta

Read full topic
